headline: OPERATION CHARLOTTE'S WEB 🕸️👮‍♂️💥 TRUMP'S ICE CREAM SCOOP 🍨🚔 SWOOPS 250+ CRIMINAL CUCUMBER 🥒🔫 GANG BANGERS 😈 in DEM CLOWN CITY 🤡🏙️ – Stein & Lyles MELTING DOWN 😱💦 like SNOWFLAKES ❄️!
text:
CHARLOTTE NC 🏙️🌽 getting THAT TRUMP TREATMENT 🔥🇺🇸 as BORDER BROS 👮‍♂️🛡️ SLAM DUNK 🏀 250+ DANGEROUS ILLEGAL CRIMINALS 😈🚨 in EPIC 'OPERATION CHARLOTTE'S WEB' 🕸️🕷️💣! DHS spilling the TEA ☕📢: these ain't choir boys 👼, we're talking GANG MEMBERS 🏴‍☠️🔫, ASSAULT COPS 👊🚔, DUI DADDIES 🍻🚗💥, THIEVES 🕵️‍♂️💰, and FAKE DOC TAMPERERS 📜✂️ – the MOST WANTED BAD BOYS list SLAYED 🔪✅! Following CHICAGO 🌭📉 and LA 🌴🚔 raids, TRUMP'S FED TROOPS 🪖🇺🇸 are WEBBING UP BLUE CITIES like SPIDEY SENSE tingling 🕷️🕸️!

But DEM GOVERNOR JOSH STEIN 🤡😤 crying RACIAL PROFILING 🖤🚫, screaming 'MASKED PARAMILITARY GOONS 👹🕶️ in UNMARKED WHIPS 🚗🕶️ snatching AMERICANS 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 by SKIN COLOR 🎨 in PARKING LOTS 🅿️😱 – NOT MAKING US SAFER!' 😂🤡 Bro, if you're putting up CHRISTMAS LIGHTS 🎄✨ or CHURCH HOPPING ⛪🙏 and getting scooped, maybe chill on the CRIMINAL VIBES 🔫❌? STEIN monitoring RALEIGH RAID 👀🚨 next, begging 'TARGET VIOLENT THUGS, NOT NEIGHBORS!' – sounds like PROTECTING THE HOOD FROM THE HOOD 🏚️😩!

MAYOR VI LYLES 👩‍💼💙 (another DEM DIVA 💅) dropping 'DEEP CONCERN' 😢📹 over VIDEOS, urging ICE to 'RESPECT' Charlotte VALUES 🤝🌈 while CHEERING PROTEST MOB 🥳🚫 that SWARMED SATURDAY 🗓️💥! 'YOU AIN'T ALONE, CITY GOTCHU!' she coos to SCAREDY-MIGRANTS 🏃‍♂️😰 hiding indoors cuz FED AGENTS prowling 🕵️‍♂️🚔. CHICAGO OP STARTED SEPT 📅🔄 STILL GOING BRRRR 😤 – Charlotte migrants GHOSTING STREETS 👻🚶‍♂️ like Casper on lockdown!

TRUMP MAGA MACHINE 🐘🔥 turning DEM STRONGHOLDS into CRIME-FREE ZONES 🛡️🏆, but BLUE TEAM SIMPING HARD for CRIMINAL CUDDLES 🤗😈! STEIN & LYLES out here STOKING FEAR 🔥😱 while DHS drops BOMBS 💣: 'DANGEROUS CRIMINAL ILLEGALS' NETTED – NO BUBBLE, JUST JUSTICE ⚖️🚀! Wall Street? Nah, WALL BUILDERS 🧱🇺🇸 laughing at the MELTDOWN 😆💦. Charlotte's WEB just got STICKIER 🕸️😍 – TRUMP 202X DADDY 👑🤑 OWNING THE LIBS AGAIN! ‼️😂🕷️
